Articles.Content: When planning a maneuver node, it would be nice if there were some shortcuts for common options. For example, a hotkey or button for "Circularize orbit" that automatically creates a maneuver to circularize the orbit at the altitude of the maneuver nodes start location. And similarly a "Match Plane With Target" button that automatically creates a maneuver node to match plane with the given target at the most efficient point in the orbit.

There's a mod for that.  Flight Plan.

There sure is mods but i prefer modless for performance reasons, some mods eats lot of resources from cpu. And other reason for modless is you can share your work better with other people. Modless version is officially suppprted allways.  

I like mods but i want good life quality mods to be in game officially if they don't make gameplay too easy.

If you want to wait to see if some stuff shows up officially in the game, great.  But you might be waiting for quite a long time.
